lines.gurmukhi: rcnw cirqR icqR ibsm bicqRpn Gt Gt eyk hI Anyk huie idKwie hY
lines.transliteration_english: Rachanaa Charitr Chitr Bisam Bachitrapana , Ghat Ghat Ayk Hee Anayk Hui Dikhaai Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Creation of the wonderful play of the creator's creation is amazing and astonishing. He alone resides in all in several shapes and forms.

lines.gurmukhi: auq qy ilKq ieq pFq AMqrgiq ieqhU qy iliK pRiq auqr pTwey hY
lines.transliteration_english: Out Tay Likhat It Paddhat Antaragati , Itahoo Tay Likhi Prati Outar Patthaaay Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a letter is written by somebody who sends it to someone in another city, it is read there and after understanding it sends back a reply.

lines.gurmukhi: auq qy sbd rwg nwd ko pRsMnu kir ieq suin smiJ kY auq smJwey hY
lines.transliteration_english: Out Tay Sabad Raag Naad Ko Prasannu Kari , It Souni Samajhi Kai Out Samajhaaay Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a singer sings a song in a mode and tune that pleases someone who understands it and educate others about it.

lines.gurmukhi: rqn prIKRXRiXw pyiK primiq kY sunwvY gurmuiK sMiD imly AlK lKwey hY ]275]
lines.transliteration_english: Ratan Pareekhyyiaa Paykhi Paramiti Kai Sounaavai , Gurmukhi Sandhi Milay Alakh Lakhaaay Hai ?275?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a jewel evaluator inspects a jewel, learns about its characteristics and educate others about it, so would a Guru oriented Sikh who has become one with True Guru by virtue of His teachings and words, he alone can brief and educate others about the
